translations: vt.通知，报告（apprise 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: Tactfully toot your own horn by periodically apprising your manager of your successes.
sentences.translation: 你应该定期巧妙的把你取得的成绩告诉老板。

sentences.sentence: Second, to establish an apprising index system of realized degree of Xinjiang's agricultural economic growth.
sentences.translation: 其次，建立了评价新疆农业经济增长方式转变实现度的指标体系；

sentences.sentence: After strict apprising and choosing, China Edible Fungi Association granted Alphay the honorary title of The Most Influential Enterprise in the Edible Fungi Industry of China.
sentences.translation: 农业部把安惠公司作为“国家食用菌加工技术研发分中心”。中国食用菌协会经过严格评选，授予安惠公司“全国食用菌行业最具影响力企业”荣誉称号。
